title: Sales Consultant
job_description:
Company Description
Transform Group is a Platinum Partner of Lark in Vietnam, specializing in the distribution and implementation of Lark to drive digital transformation and optimize business operations. Additionally, Transform Group serves as the official representative of Jodoo, a leading no-code platform empowering businesses to master technology and build internal operational solutions without coding. By combining Lark and Jodoo, Transform Group delivers comprehensive digital transformation solutions, enabling seamless communication, collaboration, and process digitization. These solutions span advanced business management functions, including CRM, Service Delivery, OKR/KPI, HRM, Finance, and Manufacturing Management, ensuring end-to-end digitalization for enterprises.
Job Overview:
We are seeking passionate and driven Sales Consultants (Fresher) to join our dynamic sales team. As a fresher, you’ll kickstart your career by engaging with new leads and qualified leads, introducing Jodoo’s innovative no-code solutions to SMEs. No prior experience is required—just a hunger to learn, connect, and grow!
Key Responsibilities:
Engage with new leads: Reach out to potential clients via calls, emails, chat... to introduce the platform.
Nurture qualified leads: Build relationships with prospects, understand their business needs, and guide them toward solutions.
Consult and educate: Showcase how customizable tools (e.g., CRM, workflow automation) can solve clients’ challenges.
Collaborate with the team: Work closely with sales and marketing teams to qualify leads and drive conversions.
Track and report: Use CRM tools to manage leads, update progress, and contribute to sales goals.
requirements:
What We’re Looking For:
Fresh graduates or individuals with 0-1 year of experience in sales, customer service, or related fields.
Passion for connecting with people and building relationships.
Strong communication skills (English proficiency required; additional languages like Vietnamese/Chinese are a plus).
Eagerness to learn about no-code platforms and sales processes.
Proactive, results-driven, and comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.
Familiarity with CRM tools or collaboration tools is a bonus, but not required.
